params.dealer.def: mux name=mux ! pantilt port=@PANTILT.PORT@ max_speed=1000 speed_threshold=1 speed_threshold=100 speed_span_post=100 cod=5,0 ! pcuda_remapper name=remapper ho=1 dup=0 edge_r="0.2" s=@APP.SIZE@ n_vstreams=@APP.N_STREAMS@
params.mux.vin0: redis watch=pserver-nmea watch=pserver-encoder watch=pserver-imu ! v4l2_capture name=capture s=@APP.CAM0@ ! mjpeg_tegra_decoder name=decoder cudamem=@JPGDEC.CUDAMEM@
